record.id: field.name="password" and file.name="operator" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: password
record.file.name: operator

brief.brief: A password for the operator, if a password is required at login.
If this field is empty (NULL), the operator does not have to enter a password to login unless the System Wide Company Record requires one.

detail.detail: Service Manager always hides the characters in this field.
You can change an operator's password here by typing in a new password. Operators can always change their own passwords.
You can configure password composition requirements, expiration, and reset options in the System Wide Company Record.
